Yes, there are many crime movies that have a similar tone to The Shawshank Redemption. One movie that comes to mind is The Departed, directed by Martin Scorsese. It's a crime thriller that follows the story of a cop and a criminal who are both trying to expose each other's identities. It has a great cast, including Jack Nicholson, Leonardo DiCaprio, and Matt Damon, and it won multiple Academy Awards.

Another movie that you might enjoy is Prisoners, starring Hugh Jackman and Jake Gyllenhaal. It's a suspenseful thriller that follows a desperate father seeking justice for his kidnapped daughter, and it has some great plot twists and intense scenes.

Finally, you might also like Zodiac, directed by David Fincher. It's based on a true story, and it follows the hunt for the infamous Zodiac killer, who terrorized the San Francisco Bay Area in the late 1960s and early 1970s. Like The Shawshank Redemption, it's a smart, well-made movie that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
